verses.verse: (For the choir director; according to the Shoshannim. <WH7799> A Maskil of the sons of) (Korah. A Song of Love.) My heart <WH3820> overflows <WH7370> with a good <WH2896> theme; <WH1697> I address <WH559> my verses <WH4639> to the King; <WH4428> My tongue <WH3956> is the pen <WH5842> of a ready <WH4106> writer. <WH9373>

Thou art fairer <WH3302> than <WH4480> the sons <WH1121> of men; <WH120> Grace <WH2580> is poured <WH3332> upon Thy lips; <WH8193> Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> God <WH430> has blessed <WH1288> Thee forever. <WH5769>
Gird <WH2296> Thy sword <WH2719> on [Thy] thigh, <WH3409> O Mighty <WH1368> One, <WH1368> [In] Thy splendor <WH1935> and Thy majesty! <WH1926>

And in Thy majesty <WH1926> ride <WH7392> on victoriously, <WH6743> For the cause <WH1697> of truth <WH571> and meekness <WH6038> [and] righteousness; <WH6664> Let Thy right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> teach <WH3384> Thee awesome <WH3372> things. <WH3372>
Thine arrows <WH2671> are sharp; <WH8150> The peoples <WH5971> fall <WH5307> under <WH8478> Thee; [Thine arrows are] in the heart <WH3820> of the King's enemies. <WH340>
Thy throne, <WH3678> O God, <WH430> is forever <WH5769> and ever; <WH5703> A scepter <WH7626> of uprightness <WH4334> is the scepter <WH7626> of Thy kingdom. <WH4438>

Thou hast loved <WH157> righteousness, <WH6664> and hated <WH8130> wickedness; <WH7562> Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> God, <WH430> Thy God, <WH430> has anointed <WH4886> Thee With the oil <WH8081> of joy <WH8342> above <WH4480> Thy fellows. <WH2270>

All <WH3605> Thy garments <WH899> are [fragrant with] myrrh <WH4753> and aloes <WH174> [and] cassia; <WH7102> Out of ivory <WH8127> palaces <WH1964> stringed <WH4482> instruments <WH4482> have made <WH8055> Thee glad. <WH8055>
Kings' daughters <WH1323> are among Thy noble <WH3368> ladies; At Thy right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> stands <WH5324> the queen <WH7694> in gold <WH3800> from Ophir. <WH211>
Listen, <WH8085> O daughter, <WH1323> give <WH7200> attention <WH7200> and incline <WH5186> your ear; <WH241> Forget <WH7911> your people <WH5971> and your father's house; <WH1004>
Then the King <WH4428> will desire <WH183> your beauty; <WH3308> Because <WH3588> He is your Lord, <WH136> bow <WH7812> down <WH7812> to Him.
And the daughter <WH1323> of Tyre <WH6865> [will come] with a gift; <WH4503> The rich <WH6223> among the people <WH5971> will entreat <WH9134> your favor. <WH6440>
The King's daughter <WH1323> is all <WH3605> glorious <WH3519> within; <WH6441> Her clothing <WH3830> is interwoven <WH4865> with gold. <WH2091>
She will be led <WH2986> to the King <WH4428> in embroidered <WH7553> work; <WH7553> The virgins, <WH1330> her companions <WH7464> who follow <WH310> her, Will be brought <WH935> to Thee.
They will be led <WH2986> forth <WH2986> with gladness <WH8057> and rejoicing; <WH1524> They will enter <WH935> into the King's palace. <WH1964>
In place <WH8478> of your fathers will be your sons; <WH1> You shall make <WH1121> them princes <WH7896> in all <WH8269> the earth. <WH3605>

I will cause Thy name <WH8034> to be remembered <WH2142> in all <WH3605> generations; <WH1755> Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> the peoples <WH5971> will give <WH3034> Thee thanks <WH3034> forever <WH5769> and ever. <WH5703>
